sndlib.core.solution
Class FlowPath

java.lang.Object
  sndlib.core.solution.FlowPath

public final class FlowPath
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a single flow path of a DemandRouting of a specific Solution.

A FlowPath consists of a flow value and a path on which the flow is routed.

For constructing a new FlowPath a parent Solution and a parent DemandRouting is needed.

Author:
Roman Klaehne
See Also:
DemandRouting, Solution.newFlowPath(DemandRouting, double, List), Solution, Demand

linkIds

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> linkIds()
Returns a List view of the ID's of the links forming the path.

The returned list is unmodifiable. That means that each attempt to modify the collection will cause an UnsupportedOperationException.

Returns:
an unmodifiable list view of the ID's of the links forming the path
